text.div:
erase

OPERATION: erase

The erase operation remove a specific resource instance.

name: Erase
description: The erase operation remove an instance of a resource, or a version of an instance of a resource.

parameter.name: patient
parameter.documentation: The patient identifier used in audit log. Maximum size is 1024 characters.

parameter.name: reason
parameter.documentation: The reason for the erasure of the Resource instance and all of its versions. Maximum size is 1024 characters.

parameter.name: id
parameter.documentation: The specific logicalId that is to be deleted, ignored if $erase is performed on an Resource instance.

parameter.name: version
parameter.documentation: The specific version that is to be deleted.
